    • setup

      public void setup​(Builder builder1, Builder builder2, Coords coords1, Coords coords2) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException
      Sets the position of builder1 to coords1 and builder2 to coords2
      Parameters:
      builder1 - the first player's builder
      builder2 - the second player's builder
      coords1 - the coordinates where the first builder will be placed
      coords2 - the coordinates where the second builder will be placed
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if params aren't legal
      java.io.IOException

    • start

      public void start​(java.lang.String player) throws java.io.IOException
      Method that manages tasks at the beginning of the turn
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • builderSelection

      public boolean builderSelection​(java.lang.String player, Builder builder)
      Checks if the builder belongs to the player
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      builder - selected builder
      Returns:
      true if the builder belongs to the player, false otherwise

    • move

      public void move​(Builder builder, Coords coords) throws java.io.IOException
      Moves builder into the cell's coordinates
      Parameters:
      builder - builder that is currently moving
      coords - coordinates of the cell where the builder wants to move
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(Builder builder, Coords coords)
      Parameters:
      builder - builder that is currently moving
      coords - coordinates of the cell where the builder wants to move
      Returns:
      true if builder can move into coords' cell, else return false

    • force

      public void force​(Builder builder, Coords coords) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets the forced position of builder
      Parameters:
      builder - forced builder
      coords - coordinates of the cell where the builder is forced to move
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • build

      public void build​(Builder builder, Coords buildingPosition) throws java.io.IOException
      Builds a level in the specified position
      Parameters:
      builder - builder that is currently building
      buildingPosition - coordinates of the cell where the builder wants to build
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkBuild

      public boolean checkBuild​(Builder builder, Coords buildingPosition)
      Checks if the building position is legal
      Parameters:
      builder - builder that is currently building
      buildingPosition - coordinates of the cell where the builder wants to build
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to build in the specified position, false otherwise

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(Builder builder, Coords precedentPosition, Coords currentPosition)
      Parameters:
      builder - builder that was involved in the current turn
      precedentPosition - position occupied by the builder before moving
      currentPosition - position currently occupied by the builder
      Returns:
      true if the player did win in this turn, false otherwise

      Method that manages tasks at the end of the turn.

      Returns:
